description.value:
Level 1 Evocation

Casting Time: 1 action

Range: cube

Components: V, S

Duration: Instantaneous

You unleash a wave of thunderous energy. Each creature in a 15-foot Cube [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cube originating from you makes a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 2d8 Thunder damage and is pushed 10 feet away from you. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only. In addition, unsecured objects that are entirely within the Cube [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cube are pushed 10 feet away from you, and a thunderous boom is audible within 300 feet.

At Higher Levels: The damage increases by 2d8|1-9|1d8 for each spell slot level above 1.
